li.a: Megan Morgan, RN, BSN, PHN, LSN (Licensed School Nurse)
Megan Morgan, RN, BSN, PHN, LSN (Licensed School Nurse)
Megan Morgan, RN, BSN, PHN, LSN

span.span:
The MCW April Board meeting will be held via teleconference. It will be live streamed on YouTube for the public to view. A link to the meeting will be posted here immediately before the meeting begins.
Public comments can be submitted to mcwcentraloffice@mcwmavericks.org at least 24 hours prior to the Board Meeting.

strong.span: If you have completed Kindergarten registration paperwork you can mail or drop off at Sherburn Elementary. If you did not receive paperwork and would like to enroll your child for MCW Kindergarten for next year, please contact Carolyn Ficken at Sherburn Elementary, 507-764-2330.

span.strong: Distance Learning begins on Monday, March 30 until further notice.

div.strong: Martin County West Schools will be delivering meals on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday. Times and locations will remain the same.

br.strong: Meals will be deliverd by Martin County West buses.

br.br: Persons picking up meals must provide their name and the number of children 18 and under. Children must be present to receive a meal.

a.style: font-family : Verdana; font-size : 11px; color : black !important; text-decoration : none;
